As a copywriting expert in the restaurant business, creating a comprehensive four-year business plan for a micro-brew restaurant in Las Cruces, NM is a multi-step process that requires careful research and planning. Based on the search results, I recommend considering the following components:

I. Executive Summary: The first section should provide an overview of the business plan, including the concept, goals, and financial projections.

II. Business Overview: This section should provide a detailed overview of the restaurant's concept, history, and current operations. It should also cover market research and competition analysis.

III. Marketing Plan: This section should include a detailed marketing plan with strategies for building brand awareness, attracting new customers, and retaining existing ones. It should also include a budget and timeline for implementation.
